body:
Hey!
I'm hallomj, you can call me hallo/hall/hallom/daniel....I don't mind xD
I'm new player here, pretty good in PvP, just learned rushing, pretty fun :D
By the way, the steve skin is because i forgot the security question, and cannot change that.
I hope i will have fun in the formus, in-game and will find friends!
Leave questions below.
Cya ;)
